item.title: Contact Us
item.description: 可以通过以下方式联系我们： BACK 的家长—-安之Zeno test 🧣微博 🍌即刻 🍠小红书 🐦推特 BACK 的家长—-小昊Sidney 🧣微博 🍌即刻 🍠小红书 🐦推特 或者是加入我们的公测群

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: 🌍Language：简体中文 | EN This page is used to inform users of our application’s policy on the collection and use of personal information. The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, and we will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this privacy policy. Security Basically, we do not collect any information or data from our users. BACK is a logging application and all users’ works and data are stored locally in the application.

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: 🌍Language：简体中文 | EN 1. General Provisions BACK provides its services to you in accordance with the following terms of service. These terms may be updated by BACK at any time and without notice. In the event of a change to the BACK Terms of Use (“Terms of Use”), BACK will post the change on this page. The modified Usage Agreement will effectively replace the original Usage Agreement once it is posted on the web site.
